pullrequest.title: Added gui-client-plugin option. Leave -g to load System Plugins (issue #2279)

content.raw: I'm probably abusing of the concept of `deprecated`. My intention was to move away users from using `-g` to load GUI Plugins and move them to `--gui-client-plugin`. I agree that it has very little sense to remove the option of loading System plugins in the client but we will need a new PR to implement it with a new argument (probably a good time to think about the naming of arguments specially when we invoke the gazebo command and it has to pass arguments to client/server). If we find a better way of expressing the idea in the scope the PR (fix the regression) I'm happy to change it.
